meanings.definition: The act of operating a vehicle without manual control.
meanings.sent1: Autoing is when a car drives itself without a person steering.
meanings.sent2: I saw the autoing feature in action as the car navigated through traffic on its own.
meanings.sent3: The autoing of the car made it seem like a magical self-driving vehicle.
meanings.sent4: The autoing of the car was like having a ghostly chauffeur at the wheel.
meanings.sent5: The autoing of the vehicle was both impressive and slightly eerie.

meanings.definition: The process of performing a task automatically or without human intervention.
meanings.sent1: Autoing can save time by completing tasks without needing human input.
meanings.sent2: The autoing of the system allowed it to run smoothly without constant monitoring.
meanings.sent3: I wish my chores could be done through autoing, so I could relax more.
meanings.sent4: The autoing of the machine was like having a helpful robot assistant.
meanings.sent5: The autoing process made everything so much easier and efficient.
